articles.author: Carla K. Johnson And Mike Stobbe
articles.title: CDC: Many healthy Americans can take a break from masks - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Most Americans live in places where healthy people, including students in schools, can safely take a break from wearing masks under new U.S. guidelines released Friday.
articles.content:
Most Americans live in places where healthy people, including students in schools, can safely take a break from wearing masks under new U.S. guidelines released Friday.
